roleset.name: to treat badly or unfairly
roleset.note: MISTREAT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mistreat' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mistreat.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` They-1 were willing [*-1] to mistreat us because we had n't shown any moxie , any resistance , '' says [*T*-2]William Queenan , a DC-10 pilot and 14-year Federal veteran .
